entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
